remarks: If a mapping to cardinals has an infinite value, then the union of its image is an infinite cardinal.  Corollary 11.17 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 104.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Nov-2004.)
statement:
cardinfima $p |- ( A e. B -> ( ( F : A --> ( _om u. ran aleph ) /\ E. x e. A ( F ` x ) e. ran aleph ) -> U. ( F " A ) e. ran aleph ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d F x $.
